name: Invoke-Obfuscation Via Use MSHTA
description: Detects Obfuscated Powershell via use MSHTA in Scripts
query: (process.command_line:/.*[Ss][Ee][Tt].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\&\&.*/ AND process.command_line:/.*[Mm][Ss][Hh][Tt][Aa].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*[Vv][Bb][Ss][Cc][Rr][Ii][Pp][Tt]\:[Cc][Rr][Ee][Aa][Tt][Ee][Oo][Bb][Jj][Ee][Cc][Tt].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\.[Rr][Uu][Nn].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\([Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww]\.[Cc][Ll][Oo][Ss][Ee]\).*/)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.command_line:*set* AND process.command_line:*\&&* AND process.command_line:*mshta* AND process.command_line:*vbscript\:createobject* AND process.command_line:*.run* AND process.command_line:*\(window.close\)*)`
